name: Zombie Battle Begins
description:
Want to play a Survival Zombie Game? 
Try Zombie Battle Begins and give us a constructive feedback.

Now this game is in development, gameplay with all features aprox.: 15min.  But you can kill the zombies and increase your score! 

In next updates we are coming up with more features, like multiplayer or day/night cycle, boss battles and such more :) 

Support us if you really like the project and come in our Zombie Battle Begins Community on Discord or Facebook page, we waiting you :D

I hope you enjoy the game, good luck and defeat the zombies, survive and craft.
